rooms.description: A welcoming corridor leading into the living area
Spacious open-plan living room with large windows facing the courtyard for natural light and ventilation as per Vastu principles.
Open dining area adjoining the living room with views of the central courtyard.
Modern kitchen with an island counter and ventilation system, positioned in the east to promote positivity.
Guest room featuring a private balcony facing the courtyard
Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and closet, located in the north-west for auspiciousness.

openings.description: Entrance to the private gym area.

rooms.description: Child bedroom with natural lighting and closet
Bedroom for the second child with adjoining study area.
Small study area attached to bedroom_2
Bathroom for the upper floor bedrooms

openings.description: Staircase leading to the private gym and rooftop terrace.
Window providing natural light in the gym area.

rooms.description: Sleek rooftop terrace with minimalistic design elements and privacy screens; ideal for relaxation and family gatherings.
